metadata.title: CVE-2023-43785 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A vulnerability was found in libX11 due to a boundary condition within the_XkbReadKeySyms() function. This flaw allows a local user to trigger anout-of-bounds read error and read the contents of memory on the system.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-43785` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libx11-6 - 2:1.6.9-2ubuntu1.6
libx11-data - 2:1.6.9-2ubuntu1.6
libx11-xcb1 - 2:1.6.9-2ubuntu1.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libx11 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.6.9-2ubuntu1.6').
